entry.title: The Bible Story of Queen Esther (Animation)

media:group.media:title: The Bible Story of Queen Esther (Animation)
media:group.media:description:
Here's a video that kids and adults will enjoy. This is the story of a beautiful queen who showed courage and faith to save her fellow Jews from execution. Her name is Esther.
Esther is described in the Book of Esther as a Jewish queen of the Persian king Ahasuerus (commonly identified as Xerxes I, reigned 486–465 BCE).[1] In the narrative, Ahasuerus seeks a new wife after his queen, Vashti, refuses to obey him, and Esther is chosen for her beauty. The king's chief advisor, Haman, is offended by Esther's cousin and guardian, Mordecai, and gets permission from the king to have all the Jews in the kingdom killed. Esther foils the plan, and wins permission from the king for the Jews to kill their enemies, and they do so.
Her story is the traditional basis for Purim, which is celebrated on the date given in the story for when Haman's order was to go into effect, which is the same day that the Jews killed their enemies after the plan was reversed.
Please don't forget to Like & SUBSCRIBE for you to enjoy more animated stories from the Bible. Thank you and God bless!

entry.title: Moses The Egyptian | Bible Stories | Animated | Children | Inspirational | Cartoon

media:group.media:title: Moses The Egyptian | Bible Stories | Animated | Children | Inspirational | Cartoon
media:group.media:description:
Welcome to a very Special segment of Faith IBC TV - "Children's Bible Stories" it is a feature under "Faith Inspirational" that allows children and those who love and enjoy the stories of the Holy Bible in movie and or animated forms.
Our Children are our future, so let us always make the Word of God available to them in ways that they would understand and enjoy.
Faith Inspirational feature videos shall be published every Sunday @ 1pm
All God's beautiful children, these featured movies would be waiting for you on your return home from Sunday morning Church service. Sit back and enjoy.
Disclaimer: I am not the creator of this video nor do I hold any rights to its contents. All rights to its creators, directors and cast accordingly. I am just one to Help share the "Good News"
Source of this video: Video: archive.org

entry.title: The Story of Jesus- Full Movie

media:group.media:title: The Story of Jesus- Full Movie
media:group.media:description: The year is 6th BC, many years had passed since Daniel’s prophecies, and most had forgotten the prophecies of a coming messiah. Mankind had strayed away from the god's way. Evil was prevailing. It was now time god will send his son to cleanse mankind to his sins. The prophecy was about to be fulfilled. Journey back to the holy land and witness the three epic events in the new testament- nativity, baptism & three temptations. Your kids will never be able to take their eyes off in this enthralling 3D adventure. Embark on an amazing visual treat watch the story of king of kings for the first time in 3D.

entry.title: Story of Jeremiah | Full episode | 100 Bible Stories

media:group.media:title: Story of Jeremiah | Full episode | 100 Bible Stories
media:group.media:description:
Story of Prophet Jeremiah.
The prophet Jeremiah is one of four Major Prophets along with Isaiah, Ezekiel, and Daniel in Hebrew Scripture, our Old Testament of the Bible. The son of a priest from the small town of Anathoth in Judah, the prophet Jeremiah dictated prophecies from the Lord to his secretary, Baruch. God sends Jeremiah to give rebellious Judah His final warning. Stubborn, the people of Israel refuse to listen. They throw Prophet Jeremiah into a well, who is then saved by his followers.
100 Bible Stories is a new series consisting of wonderful animated episodes based on the Holy Bible. Watch this to learn the stories from Bible!

entry.title: KING DAVID | The entire movie for children in English | TOONS FOR KIDS | EN

media:group.media:title: KING DAVID | The entire movie for children in English | TOONS FOR KIDS | EN
media:group.media:description:
KING DAVID | The entire movie for children in English | TOONS FOR KIDS | EN. King David is the story of a Shepard King anointed by the Lord to succeed Saul for his disobedience. David wins many battles before one day falling in love with Bathsheba — the wife of one of his officers. Together, their union produces a son who will oneday grow up to become Solomon the Great...
🎬 OTHER CARTOONS: http://bit.ly/NanTOONS_Playlists 💙 SUBSCRIBE: http://bit.ly/NanTOONS_Subscribe 👍 LIKE US ON FACEBOOK: http://bit.ly/NanFilms_FB

entry.title: Story of Job | Full episode | 100 Bible Stories

media:group.media:title: Story of Job | Full episode | 100 Bible Stories
media:group.media:description:
Story of Prophet Job | Bible Stories
This is the story of Job, who was the richest man in Middle East. He was kind to the poor, and he was devoted to the Lord. One day his fortunes turn upside down, and he loses everything- including his house, wife, sons! Was he being tested by the Lord? How will he react? Watch this episode to learn more!
100 Bible Stories is a new series consisting of wonderful animated episodes based on the Holy Bible. Watch this to learn the stories from Bible!
